quote: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other. – Mother Teresa
fact: Clownfish, wrasses, moray eels, gobies and other fish species are known to change sex, including reproductive functions. A school of clownfish is always built into a hierarchy with a female fish at the top. When she dies, the most dominant male changes sex and takes her place.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Did you hear about the Mexican train killer? He had loco motives
